citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:45 on
01/04/2016.
There was no one home at the residence. A voicemail message was left for the licensee.

narrative:

ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.

There was no one home at the residence.  A voicemail message was left for the licensee.
